column3:
Concept NACK. What is this fixing exactly, and why does adding a bunch of prints fix it? 

> so to avoid changing global gpg settings and avoid timeouts

It's highly unlikely we are going to merge this into our gitian descriptors instead of you adjusting your settings.

@fanquake This is no bug fix, just an addon for gitian builders. This is to avoid timeouts in case you out of the machine :) I was looking for another way but thats all I got to keep it multiplatform. On the other hand - you don't want to change the timeout, for security reasons. Again, Im not a fan of extra lines as well, but thats all I could get to keep it across all platforms. Just retrogradin
Right. In that case, thanks for the PR, but this seems like something you should be solving locally.
